unnormalised: ## Basket Bhool Gaye? Don't be a Rahul, Remember Your Cart!
normalised: Basket Bhool Gaye? Don't be a Rahul, Remember Your Cart!

unnormalised: We've all been there. It's a Sunday afternoon, you're chilling with chai and samosas, scrolling through Flipkart. You spot the perfect kurta for your cousin Priya's wedding, a swanky new phone cover that screams "Main Hoon Don!", and maybe even a slightly-too-expensive pressure cooker because "Mom was right, Prestige *is* the best." You happily add everything to your cart.
normalised: We've all been there. It's a Sunday afternoon, you're chilling with chai and samosas, scrolling through Flipkart. You spot the perfect kurta for your cousin Priya's wedding, a swanky new phone cover that screams "Main Hoon Don!", and maybe even a slightly-too-expensive pressure cooker because "Mom was right, Prestige is the best." You happily add everything to your cart.

unnormalised: Then…bam! The doorbell rings. Auntie Sunita is here for an unexpected visit, armed with gossip and a "small" mountain of mithai. The next thing you know, three hours have passed, you're deep in discussions about Sharmaji's son's latest escapades, and that glorious shopping cart? Vanished from your memory like a dream.
normalised: Then…bam! The doorbell rings. Auntie Sunita is here for an unexpected visit, armed with gossip and a "small" mountain of mithai. The next thing you know, three hours have passed, you're deep in discussions about Sharmaji's son's latest escapades, and that glorious shopping cart? Vanished from your memory like a dream.

unnormalised: Sound familiar? That, my friend, is cart abandonment. It's like leaving a half-eaten plate of biryani – a tragedy!
normalised: Sound familiar? That, my friend, is cart abandonment. It's like leaving a half-eaten plate of biryani – a tragedy!

unnormalised: Now, why does this happen? Maybe the shipping cost was higher than your expectations (Delhi ke traffic se zyada mehenga?). Perhaps you got distracted by that viral cat video. Or maybe you were just secretly hoping the universe would manifest a discount code (we've all tried that, right?).
normalised: Now, why does this happen? Maybe the shipping cost was higher than your expectations (Delhi ke traffic se zyada mehenga?). Perhaps you got distracted by that viral cat video. Or maybe you were just secretly hoping the universe would manifest a discount code (we've all tried that, right?).

unnormalised: Whatever the reason, abandoned carts are a major headache for online retailers. But don't worry, we're here to help!
normalised: Whatever the reason, abandoned carts are a major headache for online retailers. But don't worry, we're here to help!

unnormalised: Think of it like this: your shopping cart is a Rajdhani Express train to happiness. Don't let it leave the station without you! We'll explore tips and tricks to remind those absent-minded shoppers to complete their purchases next time. Think targeted ads saying, "Arrey yaar, that kurta is still waiting!" Or maybe even a personalized email featuring a sad-looking Prestige cooker.
normalised: Think of it like this: your shopping cart is a Rajdhani Express train to happiness. Don't let it leave the station without you! We'll explore tips and tricks to remind those absent-minded shoppers to complete their purchases next time. Think targeted ads saying, "Arrey yaar, that kurta is still waiting!" Or maybe even a personalized email featuring a sad-looking Prestige cooker.

unnormalised: Stay tuned for more ways to rescue your carts and avoid becoming the next 'cart abandonment' statistic. After all, nobody wants to be the Rahul who forgets the love of his life...or in this case, a killer deal on a microwave oven.
normalised: Stay tuned for more ways to rescue your carts and avoid becoming the next 'cart abandonment' statistic. After all, nobody wants to be the Rahul who forgets the love of his life...or in this case, a killer deal on a microwave oven.
